clinical_study.official_title: Elementary School Mindfulness-Based Substance Use Prevention Program

collaborator.agency: National Institute on Alcohol Abuse and Alcoholism (NIAAA)

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to conduct a randomized controlled trial to evaluate the efficacy of the Master Mind program, a mindfulness education substance abuse prevention program. The program has the goal of enhancing coping strategies and decision-making skills and preventing substance abuse in late elementary school students.

primary_outcome.measure: Change in score on Positive and Negative Affect Scale for Children - Shortened Version (PANAS)
primary_outcome.description: Assesses students' experiences of positive and negative emotions.

primary_outcome.measure: Change in score on Self-Report Coping Measure
primary_outcome.description: Assesses students' coping in response to stressors.

primary_outcome.measure: Change in score on Intentions to use alcohol or tobacco
primary_outcome.description: Assesses students' intentions to use alcohol or tobacco in the future.

primary_outcome.measure: Change in score on Willingness to use alcohol or tobacco
primary_outcome.description: Assesses students' willingness to use alcohol or tobacco by responding to imagined situations.

primary_outcome.measure: Change in score on The Peer Relations questionnaire
primary_outcome.description: Assesses students' feelings about their classmates.

primary_outcome.measure: Change in score on The Emotional Self-Efficacy Scale for Youth
primary_outcome.description: Assesses students' beliefs about their ability to manage emotions.

primary_outcome.measure: Change in scores on Flanker Inhibitory Control and Attention Test
primary_outcome.description: Assesses students' executive functioning skills via a performance task.

primary_outcome.measure: Change in score on Childhood Executive Functioning Inventory (CHEXI)
primary_outcome.description: Assesses teacher ratings of students' executive functioning.

primary_outcome.measure: Change in score on The Child Behavior Scale (CBS)
primary_outcome.description: Assesses teacher ratings of student behavior and peer relationships.

primary_outcome.measure: Change in Iowa Conners Teacher Rating Scale
primary_outcome.description: Assesses teacher ratings of students' inattention and aggression.

secondary_outcome.description: Assesses the overall opinions of students in the intervention group about the Master Mind lessons and activities.
Assesses the overall opinions of teachers in the intervention group related to feasibility of the Master Mind program.

arm_group.description: Master Mind is a 25-lesson elementary school, mindfulness education substance abuse prevention program for 4th and 5th grade classrooms.

intervention.description: Master Mind is a 25-lesson elementary school mindfulness education substance abuse prevention program. Each lesson takes approximately 15 minutes and is designed to be taught by trained teachers every day for 5 weeks.
